import React from 'react'; import { formatCurrency, formatDate } from '../utils/formatters'; const APPaymentsTab = ({ allSalesData, getCustomerName }) => { const paidOrders = allSalesData?.filter(order => order.paid && order.fulfilled) || []; return (

Payment History

{paidOrders.map((order) => ( ))} {paidOrders.length === 0 && ( )}
Order ID Customer Date Amount Payment Status Fulfillment Status
#{order.orderId} {getCustomerName(order.customerId) || 'Unknown / Guest'} {formatDate(order.createdAt)} {formatCurrency(order.total)} Paid Fulfilled
No paid & fulfilled orders found.
{paidOrders.length === 0 && (
No payments found

All orders are currently unpaid

)}
); }; export default APPaymentsTab;
